short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add-on for enabling web browser automations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
iAutomate Web  Extension

iAutomate lets you automate manual processes and tasks on your computer.

This extension helps you create and run browser automations.

Install the extension to automate things like web scripting, data extraction, web app testing, filling out web forms, and more.
